description: Update a tender job schedule shift driver.
permissions: Allowed when TenderJobScheduleShiftPolicy#update? permits the related tender job schedule shift (admin, customer manager for the job customer, broker-shift trucker manager, shift driver/driver, or foreman; additional update rules may apply on the shift).
side_effects: Updates the shift driver; after save, enqueues DriverDayRecapPostSchedulerWorker and updates the shift seller_operations_contact when is_primary changes.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (shift driver ID). At least one attribute must be provided (currently only --is-primary). The shift must be a broker shift (trucker tender). For broker shifts, the user must have a membership with the seller and not be suspended from driving. User cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --is-primary
flags.description: Mark the driver as primary (true/false). Example: --is-primary true.
